column1: What a beautiful starry sky.
If only Big Sis was here to see it.
I sense a strong desire to make a wish within you.
Are you the one who called me?
You are…
My name is Tensei Muriya,
a Star God who can make any dream come true.
Yes, I'm the one who called for you.
Can you really make any dream come true?
Of course, all you need to do is pay a price.
Price? In what form?
You don't know?
As a price to achieve your dream, you need to exchange your entire life.
What!?
How can this be?
Do you think everything in this world is free?
This is how it is.
Well then,
please state your desire.
(I'm sure Big Sis will be fine even if I'm no longer…)
(No, I can't see it through.)
If I'm gone, I'm sure Big Sis will be very sad,
so I'll…pass on the wish.
So
you're not the one who called me, after all.
You don't know who I am,
neither do you know the price of a wish.
So you've found out…
Actually, the amount of lifespan that needs to be paid is proportionate to the strength of the wish.
not necessarily the wishmaker's entire life.
You…
I just said it deliberatelyto see your reaction.
Your heart is so pure, I was almost deceived,
but you hesitated at the last moment.
As punishment for deceiving a god,
I'll have you taste the wrath a god!
